::: Hell Beast looks to Liono in disgust. ::: Very well, we'll meet you at 
the beach with our escourts. Brightblade, youll be my back up, Black Aracnia, 
go with Megatron, Marine and Jackle will stay at the perimiter for defensive 
purposes only, in case anything should arise unexpectedly.

::: Hell Beast departs, followed by Megatron and Black Aracnia :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Set watched as the Energonian examined his new labratory. THe look on his 
face seem very satisfactory. :::

::: Set ::: Is everything adequate?

::: Ominous ::: More than...mush more. It is perfect.

::: Set smiled ::: Then you will give us the lay outs for the bases?

::: Ominous :::: Yes, in time. First I want to get rid of Hell Beast, you can 
have the rest.

::: Set slammed his fist on the table, which woke Ra out of his slumber. ::: 
You said you would give them to us!

::: Ominous ::: Yes, but i want to get rid of Hell BEast first and foremost!

::: Ra ::: I think that will be fine. How will you go about killing him?

::: Ominous smiled ::: I have an idea....oh yes. And in a week's time the 
Beast Wars will change forever, and the rise of Energonians will mark a new 
Era in transformer history!

::: Set ::: What?!

:: Ominous :: My species will take this planet. Its rich in elements and a 
perfectly safe haven.

::: Set ::: No, were mining this planet, we have plans here.

::: Ominous gave a smug smile on his silver face. ::: Dont worry, your 
transformer commrads will get whats coming to them....all in due time.
